description: The bulk floating ip extension doesn't show instance_uuid and fixed_ip like the regular floating ip extension. The instance_uuid omission is due to a bug relating to object conversion, and fixed_ip was inadvertently left out.
title: bulk floating ip extension is missing instance_uuid and fixed_ip

comments.content: The bulk floating ip extension doesn't show instance_uuid and fixed_ip like the regular floating ip extension. The instance_uuid omission is due to a bug relating to object conversion, and fixed_ip was inadvertently left out.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/125453
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/125453
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=cc02d56ca84c3c2c5a79fec3cffa974dd875a4bf
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit cc02d56ca84c3c2c5a79fec3cffa974dd875a4bf
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 30 10:19:45 2014 -0700

    Fix bulk floating ip ext to show uuid and fixed_ip
    
    The bulk floating ip extension was not showing the instance_uuid
    or the fixed_ip properly due to a missing join and an ommision
    when the extension was first created. This updates the extension
    to display all of the relevant data.
    
    Change-Id: I81c2c742a7eed134b5452c19da0cc55811c009ab
    Closes-Bug: #1360426
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
